Text: Nominating CommitteeNovember Dear WENH Members Elections for the new Board of Directors for are coming up This is a reminder of what was announced to the membership at our luncheon on October th Please remember to email Leesa Foster President of WENH at by November if you wish to be considered for either serving on the Nominating Committee we have two member slots available from the general membership or serving on the Board of Directors for See further information for both including available Board positions below NOMINATING COMMITTEE If you wish to selfnominate to serve on the Nominating Committee for purposes of establishing a slate of potential Board members for the upcoming election please email Leesa Foster at by November The Nominating Committee will consist of the Outgoing President Immediate Past President one retiring Board member and two members from the general membership who are not seeking election to the Board and who possess objectivity and knowledge of WENHs mission such that the most qualified candidate for each Board position may be fairly chosen BOARD OF DIRECTORS POSITIONS AVAILABLE For the upcoming Board elections if you wish to be considered for a Board position please submit a written request by November to Leesa Foster either by email to or fax to detailing the positions sought in order of preference Board positions and their duties are as follows President The President shall preside at all meetings of WENH and the WENH Board and will prepare agendas for all Board meetings The President shall perform any other duties and acts that usually pertain to this office Vice President A The Vice President shall be responsible for membership including but not limited to maintaining the membership roster collecting membership applications and dues forwarding the dues to the Treasurer mailing monthly meeting notices to the membership presiding over checkin at the monthly luncheons and events and providing name tags for members at monthly meetings In and thereafter the Vice President shall chair the Nominating Committee B The Vice President shall perform all duties the President delegates to her Upon the Presidents death resignation or disability or upon her absence or refusal to act the Vice President also shall perform the Presidents duties unless the Board has designated another person as President The Vice President shall perform the Presidents duties as long as the Presidents absence or disability continues The Vice President shall serve as PresidentElect and hold the office of President the year immediately following her election as Vice President Secretary A The Secretary shall be responsible for arrangements for the monthly meetings collecting reservations from the membership for the meetings and providing the Vice President and Treasurer with a reservation list for each meeting B The Secretary shall be the custodian of WENHs minutes and all other nonfinancial documents and property She shall keep an accurate record of the proceedings of all meetings of WENH and Board meetings C Following each WENH monthly luncheon the Secretary shall notify all who registered to attend the luncheon but did not pay requesting their payment for the luncheon Treasurer The Treasurer shall be the custodian of the WENHs financial records The Treasurer in conjunction with the President and as authorized by the Board shall attend generally to WENHs business The Treasurer shall keep an accurate record of all monies appropriated to expended by and received by the WENH The Treasurer shall account for all funds and compile an annual budget to be presented to the Board at the March Board meeting and made available to WENH members on request Assistant Treasurer The Assistant Treasurer shall serve as Treasurer Elect and hold the office of Treasurer immediately following her election as Assistant Treasurer Program Director The Program Director shall be responsible for securing appropriate speakers and programs for meetings She will also obtain speaker gifts and write thankyou notes to the speakers Career Director The Career Director shall be responsible for maintaining a Job Bank for WENH members via the WENH newsletter andor website She will also be responsible for career development programming Public Relations Director The Public Relations Director shall cultivate relations with the Houston area media for purposes of obtaining publicity for WENH programs and special events throughout the year She shall prepare press releases for submittal to the media and otherwise promote WENHs programs and events to heighten awareness of WENHs mission She is also responsible for general publicity duties as assigned by the Board Communications Director The Communications Director shall be responsible for outreach to WENH members and prospective members by facilitating internal communications and networking amongst WENH members Her duties shall include preparation and publishing of the WENH newsletter for the membership She shall also maintain WENHs website and enhance it as necessary She shall organize and implement member networking events other than special events eg social gatherings Happy Hours and sports tournaments Industry Relations Director The Industry Relations Director shall identify and cultivate relations with trade associations professional societies and member companies to enhance membership benefits and heighten awareness of WENH in the corporate sector She shall also apprise members regularly as to key industry issues via the WENH newsletter andor website email or other reasonable means She shall also interface with the Program Director regarding potential speakers whose presentation would enhance members knowledge of pertinent industry issues Special Events Director The Special Events Director shall be responsible for coordinating special events outside of the monthly luncheon meetings She shall coordinate and be responsible for every aspect of the special event including formation and management of committees to oversee specific functions within the special event DirectorsatLarge The two DirectorsatLarge positions shall serve primarily in assisting the Secretary and Vice President in their duties and support any other assignments specified by the President or the Board In addition the DirectorsatLarge shall serve on a Special Event committee TEXThtm
